name: Fantasy Weapon Select
description:
View a selection of custom-made fantasy weapons in this weapon display project! Learn about the origins of each weapon, and then style the camera and lighting to your liking!

----------------

CONTROLS:

Click/Drag - Rotate Camera

Scroll - Zoom In/Out

Arrow Keys - Cycle Weapons

Esc - Exit

Click the corner buttons to cycle weapons, view weapon info, and change the background colour.

----------------

This project was made to showcase weapon models I made as practice for my 3D asset design skills. Each weapon was based on an existing item in one of my D&D campaigns and was modeled and textured by me.

I also wanted a chance to practice my UI design skills and experiment with dynamic music, so I took the opportunity to blend all of my ideas and showcase my 3D weapon models in this cohesive weapon select project.
